interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Magnetic Eyelashes False Lashes with Magnets Top and Bottom Magnetic Lashes Resuable Lashes 2 Pair / 8pcs Natural Style
Review Date: 2020/09/16
Store: Cuckoo
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Cuckoo', 'Material': 'synthetic fibers', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.12 x 4.3 x 0.9 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Product Dimensions': '5.12 x 4.3 x 0.9 inches; 2.4 Ounces'}
Review Text: The magnet is strong. I bought the two paid sandwich style. I tried the videos, and the hacks that say cut them ...I tried applying with special lash tweezers... Nothing works to get them close to the lash lid. The magnetic is strong so I'm sure it won't fall off, but it's so strong that when you start to move the under lash toward your eye with the upper lash laying on top of your lashes, the magnetic pulls and moves is soil quickly that it always ends up locked half way through your natural lashes. And I'm a contact wearer...so it's not like I have  fear of putting stuff near my eyes. These probably will work well with lash liners. The lashes themselves look nicely constructed. It's just the application as intended is impossible.
Review Title: The lashes look beautiful but you'll never get them on
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------

True pale blonde platinum with white like highlights. Great if you bleach your hair!
Very soft. doesnt tangle. blends into your own hair very well. Easy to put on and off. Keep the bag and put them in it when not in use.
Make sure you straighten your own hair first before you put these in because these are SUPER straight! fantastic value for fake hair Elegant Hair - 17" PONYTAIL Clip in Hair Piece CURLY Platinum Blonde #16/60 REVERSIBLE Claw Clip 220g Elegant Hair {'Brand': 'Elegant Hair', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '17 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '16.93 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches; 5.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '799632434306'} Fantastic! I own the 22inch hair version as well. Both are great but the 22inch one can weight heavy on the head after 6 to 8 hours (and i suffer from migraines so I have to be careful about that) . this 17inch one is lighter but still VERY full. can wear it all day at work with no issues.
Very curly! very beautiful! Looks real! This is elegant HAIR! profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Preferences**: The user continues to have a strong interest in hair extensions, particularly synthetic options that mimic real hair. They prefer both straight and curly styles for versatility.

- **Color and Aesthetic**: The user favors platinum blonde shades with highlights and has begun exploring golden brown tones, indicating a willingness to diversify their color palette while maintaining aesthetic cohesion.

- **Product Characteristics**: They prioritize high-quality, easy-to-apply extensions that integrate well with their natural hair. Recent interactions highlight a preference for lighter, comfortable options that preserve appearance and fullness.

- **Value for Money**: The user values products that offer great value. A recent experience with magnetic eyelashes, which they found challenging to apply despite their beautiful construction, reinforces their discerning taste and expectation for quality items.

- **Care Instructions**: The user remains focused on practical care guidelines, favoring instructions promoting longevity and effective maintenance of their products.

- **Makeup Preferences**: The latest feedback on false eyelashes suggests an interest in makeup that complements their overall look, though they encountered difficulties with application techniques, indicating a need for user-friendly products in this category.

Overall, the user exhibits a consistent preference for functional and aesthetically pleasing hair and makeup products that are easy to use, high-quality, and provide good value, while being open to exploring new styles and colors.
